channel.title: How would i make a donator box?
channel.description: Title says it all really, i am trying to make a donator box, but i don't have a clue how to. If someone could please help, i'll Rep ;D

item.title: How would i make a donator box?
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Dean., post:9, topic:402285”]Client.java

There’s a tutorial somewhere.
Goodluck(:

P.s. Just make a donator chest, and use case 192: in client.java to make it give u random items.[/quote]
i rarther have a box. ;D thanks anyway man.

item.title: How would i make a donator box?
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Dean., post:7, topic:402285”]Rename the item ID: 6199 (mystery box).
Set an action for when the box is clicked.
You can make it open an interface when clicked or give u an item.
Also use class5.java (client-sided) to rename the box name/options.

Your Welcome.[/quote]
Thanks, but how would i make it, so when you click it; you get random items?

Read full topic
item.source: How would i make a donator box?

item.title: How would i make a donator box?
item.dc:creator: @Dean1 Dean.
item.description:
@Dean1 wrote:

Rename the item ID: 6199 (mystery box).
Set an action for when the box is clicked.
You can make it open an interface when clicked or give u an item.
Also use class5.java (client-sided) to rename the box name/options.

Your Welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i make a donator box?
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“voetbal645, post:4, topic:402285”]go to commands.java

add this if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && (c.playerRights >= 4)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(Coordsx, coordsy, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the donorzone!"); }

only donators can use that command
then put objects and npcs in it gl[/quote]
Uhh, i ment a Item “donator Box.”
